How can I help ..

During 2019 I started to work with my friend and provide services to clients. Of course, I had no idea about finances, risks, life insurance, reserves, how the retirement system works in our country, statistics about disability ect.

I had to lear everything and it wasn't difficult because it touches us all. I already earned some money so it would be really useful to know how to work with them :).

When my fried asked me about some graphs and information regarding life insurance, retirement rules or what can we expect in pension.. I had no idea.

I thought I have no depts, I have something on my account at the end of the month, I could save some money ..so what could be possibly problem? Well, my lack of education was a problem.

So, I decided to work and help people like me. I prepare projects for my clients. We usually meat in the office or restaurant and talk about areas - like long term disease or injury, retirement, reserves, investment, flat or house, mortgage, debts, kids, pets, view to the future ect. Then I can prepare specific project for a given client and we work together long time.

On the other hand I came back to IT!

Monitoring the network and waiting if something happen was not interesting for me so I decided to change the area. Building a website or blog and see the progress is much more interesting. So I learned the coding and slowly continue to be front-end developer!

Right now I am able to create blog, website, newsletter ect. with HTML, CSS3, SASS, BOOTSTRAP 4

See my projects on github:
